main.description: Register a new account on the Coves instance. Creates account on PDS and indexes in AppView.

handle.description: Requested handle for the account (e.g., alice.coves.dev)

email.description: Email address for account recovery and notifications

inviteCode.description: Invite code (required if instance has invite-only registration)

did.description: The DID of the newly created account

handle.description: The handle of the newly created account

refreshJwt.description: Refresh token for obtaining new access tokens

errors.name: InvalidHandle
errors.description: Handle does not meet format requirements

errors.name: HandleNotAvailable
errors.description: The requested handle is already taken

errors.name: InvalidInviteCode
errors.description: The provided invite code is invalid or expired

errors.name: WeakPassword
errors.description: Password does not meet strength requirements
